Calculations¶

This subpackage contains modules with functions that perform mathematical calculations.

Basic Calculations¶

This module contains functions that make calculations :-)

FarseerNMR.calc.calc.threshold_std_of_population(values, *, std=5, population=0.1)[source]¶

Calculates the significancy threshold according to a standard deviation of a given population.

\overline{pop} + {std} st {\sigma_{pop}}

where, pop is the population percentage with the minimum values in values.

Parameters:
values : np.ndarray, dtype=float, n_dims=1

An array with the values upon which calculate the threshold.

std : int

The standard deviations. Defaults to 5.

population : float

The percentage of population with minimum values upon which the threshold is calculated. Defaults to 0.1.
Returns:
float

The threshold value.
Raises:
TypeError

If values is not np.ndarray type of ndim == 1.
